short.ar: تتبع الوقت المستغرق على مواقع الويب المختلفة
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Track time spent on different websites
short.es: Rastrea el tiempo dedicado a diferentes sitios web
short.fr: Suivez le temps passé sur différents sites web
short.ru: Отслеживание времени, проведенного на разных сайтах
short.zh_CN: 追踪在不同网站上花费的时间

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🕒 Where Is Time - Your Personal Web Time Analytics

Discover where your online time goes with this elegant and intuitive time tracking extension. Where Is Time quietly works in the background to help you understand your browsing habits and boost your productivity.

✨ Key Features:
• Beautiful Interactive Charts - Visualize your browsing patterns with stunning, easy-to-understand pie charts
• Automatic Time Tracking - Effortlessly monitor time spent on different websites while you browse
• Privacy-First Design - All data stays locally on your device, ensuring complete privacy
• Multi-Language Support - Available in English and Chinese
• Export & Share - Save your statistics as PNG or JPEG images to track your progress

🎯 Perfect for:
• Professionals looking to optimize their workday
• Students wanting to balance study and leisure time
• Anyone curious about their online habits
• Digital wellness enthusiasts
• Productivity seekers

🚀 Simple to Use:
1. Install the extension
2. Browse normally
3. Click the extension icon to see your time analytics
4. Make informed decisions about your online time

💡 Unique Benefits:
• Gain insights into your daily internet usage
• Identify time-consuming websites
• Make better decisions about your online time
• Track productivity patterns
• Set better digital boundaries

Start understanding your online time today - because time awareness leads to better time management! 

🔒 Privacy Notice: Your data never leaves your device. We respect your privacy and collect no personal information.

Free. Light-weight. Privacy-focused. Start tracking your time now!
